#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int test;
    cin>>test;
    while(test--)
    {
        cout<<endl;
        long long int n,k,sum=0,i;
        cin>>n>>k;
        int array[n];
        for(i=0;i<n;i++)
            cin>>array[i];
        sort(array,array+n);
        for(i=n-1;i>=(n-k);i--)
            sum+=array[i];
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
